牣字的基本解释

牣
rèn
满：“珍怪鸟兽……充牣其中。”
古通“韧”：“白所以为坚也，黄所以为牣也。”

牣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèn］
［《廣韻》而振切，去震，日。］
(1)盈满；充塞。
(2)引申为充实。
(3)通“韌”。柔而结实。

牣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　牣； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页698第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?而振切，音刃。【說文】滿也。【小爾雅】杜實充牣，塞也。實牣，滿也。【詩·大雅】於牣魚躍。　又【玉篇】益也。　又【呂氏春秋】白所以爲堅也，黃所以爲牣也。黃白雜，則堅且牣，良劒也。　【集韻】或書作㸾。

牣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
牣字的起名意思

满。

rèn
Man: "The rare monsters and birds...fill them all."
Gu Tong "Tough": "White is strong, and yellow is hard."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèn］
["Guangyun" and vibrate, go to vibrate, day. ]
(1) Full; congested.
(2) The extension is substantial.
(3) Through "toughness". Soft and strong.

【Sijixia】【Cow Character Department】　牣; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 698 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? And vibrating, sound blade. [Said Wen] Man Ye. [Xiao Erya] Du Shi is full of duo, and it's too much. Really, it's full. 【Poetry·Daya】Yu Diaoyu jumped.　[Jade articles] Yi Ye.　[Lu Shi Chunqiu] White is so strong, and yellow is so hard. Yellow and white mixed, then strong and stubborn, good 劒 also.　【Jiyun】or Shuzuo.
